item.title: [stx] Professor Onyx
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Liliana

Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

+1: You lose 1 life. Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

−3: Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.

−8: Each opponent may discard a card. If they don't, they lose 3 life. Repeat this process six more times.

https://twitter.com/officialDannyT/status/1374038591052021761

item.title: [stx] Kasmina, Enigma Sage
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Kasmina

Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of Kasmina, Enigma Sage.

+2: Scry 1.

−X: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.

−8: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

https://twitter.com/day9tv/status/1374027397905874944

item.title: [ppro] Basri Ket
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Basri

+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

−2: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures attack this turn, create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

−6: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control."

item.title: [ppro] Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Cleric

Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

{3}{B}{B}: Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [ppro] Seasoned Hallowblade
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Discard a card: Tap Seasoned Hallowblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

item.title: [sld] Swamp
item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

item.title: [ha4] Triumphant Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [ha4] Declaration in Stone
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature and all other creatures its controller controls with the same name as that creature. That player investigates for each nontoken creature exiled this way.

item.title: [tsr] Castle Raptors
item.description:
Creature — Bird Soldier

Flying

As long as Castle Raptors is untapped, it gets +0/+2.

item.title: [tsr] Calciderm
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

Vanishing 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

item.title: [tsr] Benalish Cavalry
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

item.title: [tsr] Judge Unworthy
item.description:
Instant

Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Judge Unworthy deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.title: [tsr] Errant Doomsayers
item.description:
Creature — Human Rebel

{T}: Tap target creature with toughness 2 or less.

item.title: [tsr] Children of Korlis
item.description:
Creature — Human Rebel Cleric

Sacrifice Children of Korlis: You gain life equal to the life you've lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

item.title: [ha4] Adorned Pouncer
item.description:
Creature — Cat

Double strike

Eternalize {3}{W}{W} ({3}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Cat with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [ha4] Thraben Inspector
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [tsr] Shade of Trokair
item.description:
Creature — Shade

{W}: Shade of Trokair gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Suspend 3—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.title: [tsr] Rebuff the Wicked
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

item.title: [tsr] Outrider en-Kor
item.description:
Creature — Kor Rebel Knight

Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Outrider en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

item.title: [tsr] Sidewinder Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

All Sliver creatures have flanking. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks a Sliver, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

item.title: [tsr] Bewilder
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [tsr] Primal Plasma
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Shapeshifter

As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.

item.title: [tsr] Jodah's Avenger
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

{0}: Until end of turn, Jodah's Avenger gets -1/-1 and gains your choice of double strike, protection from red, vigilance, or shadow. (A creature with shadow can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

item.title: [tsr] Dreamscape Artist
item.description:
Creature — Human Spellshaper

{2}{U}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [tsr] Riftwing Cloudskate
item.description:
Creature — Illusion

Flying

When Riftwing Cloudskate enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

Suspend 3—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.title: [tsr] Whip-Spine Drake
item.description:
Creature — Drake

Flying

Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.title: [tsr] Stormcloud Djinn
item.description:
Creature — Djinn

Flying

Stormcloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.

{R}{R}: Stormcloud Djinn gets +2/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [tsr] Deepcavern Imp
item.description:
Creature — Imp Rebel

Flying, haste

Echo—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

item.title: [tsr] Deadly Grub
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

When Deadly Grub dies, if it had no time counters on it, create a 6/1 green Insect creature token with shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

item.title: [tsr] Minions' Murmurs
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

item.title: [tsr] Mass of Ghouls
item.description: Creature — Zombie Warrior

item.title: [tsr] Gorgon Recluse
item.description:
Creature — Gorgon

Whenever Gorgon Recluse blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

Madness {B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [tsr] Rathi Trapper
item.description:
Creature — Human Rebel Rogue

{B}, {T}: Tap target creature.

item.title: [tsr] Psychotic Episode
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand and the top card of their library. You choose a card revealed this way. That player puts the chosen card on the bottom of their library.

Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [tsr] Muck Drubb
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Muck Drubb enters the battlefield, change the target of target spell that targets only a single creature to Muck Drubb.

Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [tsr] Skittering Monstrosity
item.description:
Creature — Horror

When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Monstrosity.

item.title: [tsr] Sangrophage
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Sangrophage unless you pay 2 life.

item.title: [tsr] Ridged Kusite
item.description:
Creature — Horror Spellshaper

{1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [tsr] Trespasser il-Vec
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Discard a card: Trespasser il-Vec gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

item.title: [tsr] Arc Blade
item.description:
Sorcery

Arc Blade deals 2 damage to any target. Exile Arc Blade with three time counters on it.

Suspend 3—{2}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [tsr] Needlepeak Spider
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [tsr] Rift Elemental
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

{1}{R}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control or suspended card you own: Rift Elemental gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [tsr] Primal Forcemage
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.title: [tsr] Thornweald Archer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [tsr] Saffi Eriksdotter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Scout

Sacrifice Saffi Eriksdotter: When target creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn, return that card to the battlefield.

item.title: [tsr] Paradise Plume
item.description:
Artifact

As Paradise Plume enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, you may gain 1 life.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

item.title: [tsr] Coalition Relic
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.

At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

item.title: [tsr] Secret Plans
item.description:
Enchantment

Face-down creatures you control get +0/+1.

Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, draw a card.

item.title: [tsr] Manifold Key
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Untap another target artifact.

{3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [ha4] Think Twice
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card.

Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
